titleStmt.title: Here is the boke of mayd Emlyn that had. v. husbandes and all kockoldes she wold make theyr berdes whether they wold or no, and gyue them to were a praty hoode full of belles.
Mayde Emlyn.
Here is the boke of mayd Emlyn that had. v. husbandes and all kockoldes she wold make theyr berdes whether they wold or no, and gyue them to were a praty hoode full of belles.
Mayde Emlyn.

publicationStmt.publisher: Without Newegate in saynt Pulkers parysshe by me Iohn̄ Skot, dwelly[n]ge in he olde Bayly,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date estimated by STC.
